item.title: Black manhattan
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml rye whisky or bourbon
  • 30 ml amaro
  • 2 dashes aromatic bitters
  • 2 dashes orange bitters
  • (garnish) cocktail cherry

Instructions

Stir ingredients over ice. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish.

item.title: Paper plane
item.description:
Amaro Nonino is expensive so feel free to substitute for a similar (or different) amaro.

Ingredients

  • 20ml bourbon
  • 20ml Aperol
  • 20ml Amaro Nonino
  • 20ml lemon juice
  • (garnish) lemon twist or miniature paper plane

Instructions

Shake ingredients with ice. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish.

item.title: Whiskey sour
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml bourbon
  • 30 ml lemon juice
  • 15 ml sugar syrup
  • 4 dashes orange bitters
  • 1/2 egg white (optional)
  • (garnish) cocktail cherry
  • (garnish) orange twist

Instructions

Dry shake ingredients. Then shake with ice. Serve in a rocks glass over ice. Garnish.
